```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
# read in the dataset and remove NAs
cars <- read.csv("~/Documents/GitHub/EmissionsGroupA/carData.csv")
```

```{r} 
# get the average co for each day
day_avg <- cars %>%
  filter(day %in% 1:13) %>%   # Select days 1 to 13
  group_by(day) %>%           # Group by day
  summarise(avg_co = mean(co, na.rm = TRUE))  # Compute the mean
cars <- left_join(cars, day_avg, by = "day")
```


```{r}
# create line graph
yugo_data <- cars %>%
  filter(car == "Yugo")

ggplot(yugo_data, aes(x = day, y = avg_co, colour = dev, group = dev)) +
  geom_line(size = 1) +  # Line color and thickness
  geom_point(size = 2) +  # Add points for clarity
  labs(title = "Yugo Co2 Emissions", x = "Day", y = "Co2 Emissions") +
  theme_minimal()
```
